attributes.additional_details:
Make it compulsory for all schools to allow sunscreen to be re-applied on the premises.
Research shows that sunscreen needs to be reapplied every two hours.
Some schools ban children from taking it on the premises. They do not incorporate shade either.
With current knowledge of skin cancer mechanisms, stop children from being put at risk.
Stop schools ruining lives and put a ruling in place to ensure that they do not prohibit its use.
